column4: Tesla wins giant battery contract in Australia  has 100-day deadline
column5: SYDNEY Tesla Inc  has won an Australian contract to install the world's biggest grid-scale battery  in what experts say will be a litmus test for the reliability of large-scale renewable energy.

column4: UPDATE 4-Tesla wins battery contract in Australia  has 100-day deadline
column5: * A litmus test for reliability of large-scale renewable energy

column4: Tesla third-quarter deliveries to include 3 500 vehicles in transit
column5: Tesla Inc  said current-quarter deliveries would include about 3 500 vehicles that were in transit to customers at the end of the second quarter  on a day the electric-car maker's first Model 3 rolls off the assembly line. | Video

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla Q3 deliveries to include 3 500 vehicles in transit
column5: July 7 Tesla Inc said current-quarter deliveries would include about 3 500 vehicles that were in transit to customers at the end of the second quarter  on a day the electric-car maker's first Model 3 rolls off the assembly line.

column4: RPT-Tesla April registrations drop in key California market
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  July 6 Registrations of Tesla Inc vehicles in California  by far the largest market of the luxury electric car maker  fell 24 percent in April from a year ago  according to data from IHS Markit.

column4: Australian state picks Tesla to provide grid-scale battery
column5: SYDNEY  July 7 South Australia has picked Tesla to install a grid-scale battery to be paired with a wind farm provided by France's Neoen  as the state battles to keep the lights on.
